original_text:
Their descendants will be known among the nations
    and their offspring among the peoples.
All who see them will acknowledge
    that they are a people the Lord has blessed.”
korean_text: 그들의 자손을 뭇 나라 가운데에, 그들의 후손을 만민 가운데에 알리리니 무릇 이를 보는 자가 그들은 여호와께 복 받은 자손이라 인정하리라

sentences.original_text: Their descendants will be known among the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 자손이 민족들 중에서 알려질 것이며

sentences.original_text: and their offspring among the peoples
All who see them will acknowledge
that they are a people the Lord has blessed
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 주께서 복 주신 백성이라는 것을
